title: Getting a pbe account in 2016
body: Just a noob here wondering how one gets a pbe account or if one even can right now? (new to forums hope i'm putting this in the right place :)

replies.body:
Getting into the PBE consists of three steps:

1. Actively play League and be a positive influence on the community.

2. Apply for PBE Access [here.](http://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

3. Continue to actively play the game while *patiently* waiting to see if you get accepted.

Additionally, we've written a good FAQ for the PBE which you can find [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
